TestAPI">ddfcd8611b567850577f43b5bb4bcb25</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=67e448e61bfab810edf3642aab4bcbf5"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>67e448e61bfab810edf3642aab4bcbf5</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-27 11:11:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>a02580a61bfab810edf3642aab4bcb0c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-27 11:11:49</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>67e448e61bfab810edf3642aab4bcbf5</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-27 11:11:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>a82580a61bfab810edf3642aab4bcb0c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-27 11:13:58</sys_updated_on><value>var strLog = '';
function Log(strText)
{
	strLog = strLog + "\n" + strText;
}
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var RenderValue = x_snc_devtools.RenderValue;

	var bResult = true;
	
	function FunctionXXX(vInput)
	{
		return 'Hello '+vInput;
	}

	function TestCase_FunctionXXX(vInput, vExpected)
	{
		Log('TestCase_FunctionXXX');
		Log('Input: '+RenderValue(vInput));
		Log('Expected: '+RenderValue(vExpected));
		var vResult = FunctionXXX(vInput);
		Log('Result  : '+RenderValue(vResult));
		if (vResult != vExpected)
		{
			bResult = false;
			Log('Test case FAILED');
		}
		Log('');
	}
	
	TestCase_FunctionXXX('John','Hello Johnny');
	TestCase_FunctionXXX('Jane','Hello Jane');
		
	stepResult.setOutputMessage(strLog);
	return bResult;
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
